New Records: Quentin Grimes set a new career-high, scoring 20 points in the third quarter, the most he's ever had in a quarter.
Key Match Events: Quentin Grimes scored 20 points in the third quarter and had a few assists, making him responsible for 28 of the Mavs' 32 third-quarter points.
Evan Mobley dominated the game, doing whatever he wanted on the court.
Brandon Williams, signed to a two-way contract, put up 13 points in 20 minutes and finished as a team-high +8.
